Freelance Full-stack Developer

Hi, I'm Walter Tanaka Chifamba

I am zimbabwean by nationality.I currently reside in Cape Town, South Africa.I am barista at Cafe Paris.Coming from a bad place with unemployment and Poverty, i came to South Africa for Greener Pastures
I accidentally bumped into Code Your future during lockdown and my prayers were answered as my job industry is dying.I have been trying to self tutor myself fullstack web dev before i ran into CYF.It was tough because i had no mentor.

Goals

I am also a Fashion designer and Music Producer, Under the brand Name Native Element ZA which is more of a lifestyle rather than a clothing brand.
We try to help young Talents to get the oportunities to speak their voice in recording free of Charge thus trying to reduce poverty and keeping the youths drug free.
